name: TastingNotes
0:
”Alexa, open tasting notes”
”Alexa, ask tasting notes what wine goes well with Korean Food.”
”Alexa, ask tasting notes what goes well with a merlot.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tasting notes
des:
Ever needed to pick out the perfect wine for a romantic dinner, but been unsure where to start? Ever wanted to know what to cook with that bottle your friend gave you last week? Ever wondered at the difference between Barbaresco and Brunello? 'Tasting Notes' is the perfect app for anyone who wants to deepen their love of the world's finest drink.

Tasting Notes can suggest wine pairings for you, describe wines by varietals and types, and recommend you bottles of wine.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
